Package security

Class Cryptography

java.lang.Object
security.Cryptography
public class Cryptography extends Object
Class contains methods for encoding/decoding onions through usage of AES. The classes who implement this class are clientProxy.ProxyServer and *.nodes

    Decrypts the current cell (onion)
    byte[]
    decryptionClientSide(Cell cell, ArrayList<Node> circuit)
    This method is only for use in the ClientProxy Method decrypts until Cell is readable, and because the guard node always is the last to encrypt, that is the key the client must use to decrypt first and so forth until the message is readable

  • Constructor Details

    • Cryptography

      public Cryptography()

  • Method Details

    • encryptSpecifiedNumberOfTimes

      public void encryptSpecifiedNumberOfTimes(Cell cell, ArrayList<Node> routers, int amount, boolean ascending)
      When creating an onion, this method is called.
      Parameters:
      cell - is the cell to encrypt
      routers - are all the routers involved in the circuit
      amount - is the amount of times the onion is to be encrypted
      ascending - true if sending from ClientProxy to nodes, false if sending from a node to ClientProxy

    • decryptionClientSide

      public byte[] decryptionClientSide(Cell cell, ArrayList<Node> circuit)
      This method is only for use in the ClientProxy Method decrypts until Cell is readable, and because the guard node always is the last to encrypt, that is the key the client must use to decrypt first and so forth until the message is readable
      Parameters:
      cell - is the cell that needs to be decrypted an unknown amount of times
      circuit - are all the routers that exist in the current circuit
      Returns:
      the decrypted cell as a byte-array

    • encrypt

      public void encrypt(Cell cell, SecretKey secretKey) throws NoSuchPaddingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException, IllegalBlockSizeException, BadPaddingException
      Throws:
      NoSuchPaddingException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeyException
      IllegalBlockSizeException
      BadPaddingException

    • decrypt

      public byte[] decrypt(byte[] cell, SecretKey secretKey) throws NoSuchPaddingException, NoSuchAlgorithmException, InvalidKeyException, IllegalBlockSizeException, BadPaddingException
      Decrypts the current cell (onion)
      Parameters:
      cell - the cell can be any type of cell, and is encrypted an unknown amount of times
      secretKey - the symmetric key that matches the current layer
      Throws:
      NoSuchPaddingException
      NoSuchAlgorithmException
      InvalidKeyException
      IllegalBlockSizeException
      BadPaddingException
